title: Detecta Antivirus
description: A pattern-based anti-PDF malware system identifies and neutralizes malicious PDF files by recognizing predefined patterns or signatures associated with known threats.

title: Employee pro
description: A Python-based employee management desktop application. It offers user authentication, comprehensive employee information management along with another functionalities

title: Search Engine
description: The search engine is designed to provide lightning-fast search results across a very large database of websites, showing in a very user-friendly UI.

title: Training Center Web Application
description: Under the supervision of Egyptian Electricity Transmission Co., the web application was implemented to help the center admins, the instructors, the students to communicate together on one platform.

title: Courses Academy Web Application
description: Under the supervision of Beta Academy, the web application was implemented to show the services that they offer. Also help students to enroll in online and offline courses.
